attributes.action: Sack the Chief Executive of the UK Border Agency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lin Homer, Head of the UK Border Agency has outraged many in the LGBT community by stating that "The simple presence of either a law or a culture that frowns upon homosexuality is not of itself a reason (to grant asylum]."

This type of language being used by such a senior government official is completely inappropriate and wrong. Neither does it inspire any confidence amongst the LGBT community that the Government is taking the views of any LGBT people into account when forming asylum policy.

We therefore call on the Prime Minister to sack the current Chief Executive of the UK Border Agency.
